text: Hi Nick and thanks for your work! :slightly_smiling_face: I am doing programming workshop with children and CodeCombat is one of the tools we use sometime. My préference goes to creative computing, especially with Scratch, but CodeCombat with its challenge approach is nice too. It is another way to practice coding for when you are not in a creative mood.

elements.text: Hi Nick and thanks for your work!

I am doing programming workshop with children and CodeCombat is one of the tools we use sometime. My préference goes to creative computing, especially with Scratch, but CodeCombat with its challenge approach is nice too. It is another way to practice coding for when you are not in a creative mood.
